wo1.name: How to Play concept - retrying a level often
wo1.description: A student repeated a particular level often in a series that establishes the basic game rules.

wo2.name: Split Groups concept - retrying a level often
wo2.description: A student repeated a particular level often in a series that establishes how to divide a group of blocks into equal parts.

wo3.name: Slice Shapes concept - retrying a level often
wo3.description: A student repeated a particular level often in a series that establishes how to divide various shapes into equal parts.

wo4.name: Shape Comparison concept - retrying a level often
wo4.description: A student repeated a particular level often in a series that establishes how to compare parts to their whole.

wo5.name: Symbolic Numerator concept - retrying a level often
wo5.description: A student repeated a particular level often in a series that introduces the numerical representation of fractions through symbols.

wo6.name: Fractions Reading concept - retrying a level often
wo6.description: A student repeated a particular level often in a series that introduces the numerical representation of fractions by comparing it to a symbolic representation.

wo7.name: Denominator concept - retrying a level often
wo7.description: A student repeated a particular level often in a series that explores different ways to divide a whole into equal parts.

wo8.name: Numerator concept - retrying a level often
wo8.description: A student repeated a particular level often in a series that explores the impact different numerators have on the quantity of ice or lava.

wo9.name: Pie Charts concept - retrying a level often
wo9.description: A student repeated a particular level often in a series that explores ways to divide a shape that resembles a pie chart.

wo10.name: Size Comparison concept - retrying a level often
wo10.description: A student repeated a particular level often in a series that explores how to compare fractions to each other to determine which represents the largest quantity and in what proportion.

wo11.name: Equivalent Fractions (A) concept - retrying a level often
wo11.description: A student repeated a particular level often in a series that have students manipulate fractions with different denominators to find out which ones are equivalent.

wo12.name: Equivalent Fractions (B) concept - retrying a level often
wo12.description: A student repeated a particular level often in a series that offers different contexts in which to use equivalent fractions.

wo13.name: Fractions Ordering concept - retrying a level often
wo13.description: A student repeated a particular level often in a series that asks players to place fractions in ascending order.

wo14.name: Question Marks concept - retrying a level often
wo14.description: A student repeated a particular level often in a series that makes students deduct the value of the parts of a whole based on the information that is available to them.

wo15.name: Subtraction concept - retrying a level often
wo15.description: A student repeated a particular level often in a series that explores the notion of subtracting quantities from 1.

list.description: This report provides a snapshot of how students are doing right now. Celebrate your students' success (Shout Out!) and intervene with those students in need of help (Watch Out!).
